channel.title: How do I make my monsters attack people?
channel.description: How do I make monster's attack people on my game? My monster's won't attack people when the people attack them. I want to know how to make my monster's attack you when you attack them.

item.title: How do I make my monsters attack people?
item.dc:creator: @masterlop masterlop
item.description:
@masterlop wrote:

How do I make monster’s attack people on my game? My monster’s won’t attack people when the people attack them. I want to know how to make my monster’s attack you when you attack them.

Read full topic
